page.title: 17SPALDWICK CHURCH
page.content: Spaldwick has a very old church with a spire.Half way down the spire are three gargoyles.There used to be four but one was knocked off.Gargoyles are heads with a hole in the mouth.When it rains the water pours out of the hole. Gargoyles are ugly.They are supposed to scare away the eval demon.On top of the spire there is a weather vane.The weather vane is a cock.There are eleven carved-heads.The heads are dotted all round the church.The walls of the church are so thick and heavy that seventeen buttresses are needed.Buttresses help to strengthen the wall. The church is surrounded by a grave yard.There are three sundials facing south at spaldwick.
